headline: Is MGM a Bargain After a 13.9% Share Price Drop and New Resort Expansion?
summary: Thinking about whether MGM Resorts International is a bargain or overpriced right now? You are not alone, as plenty of investors are looking for the smartest way to value the stock in today’s market. Over the last year, MGM’s share price has dropped by 13.9%, while this year it is down 3.3%. The past five years have actually seen a gain of 13.8%. Several headlines have caught investor attention, including the company’s expansion efforts and new resort developments, as well as industry-wide...
